import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete subtask group"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/subtasks/group/{subtaskGroupId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Permanently deletes a subtask group. Subtasks that were members of the group are preserved but become ungrouped. This operation cannot be undone.

**Prerequisites**
1. **subtaskGroupId** – Use [GET /api/v1.0/subtasks/my/groups](/docs/api/tickets/get-my-subtask-groups) to list your groups and extract `SubtaskGroupId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. List groups: [GET /api/v1.0/subtasks/my/groups](/docs/api/tickets/get-my-subtask-groups) → identify `SubtaskGroupId` to delete
2. Delete group: [DELETE /api/v1.0/subtasks/group/\{subtaskGroupId\}](/docs/api/tickets/delete-subtask-group)
3. Verify removal: [GET /api/v1.0/subtasks/my/groups](/docs/api/tickets/get-my-subtask-groups) to confirm deletion

**Note**: Only the group owner or administrators can delete a group.

**Related Endpoints**
- [POST /api/v1.0/subtasks/group/new](/docs/api/tickets/create-subtask-group) – Create a new group
- [POST /api/v1.0/subtasks/group/\{subtaskGroupId\}](/docs/api/tickets/update-subtask-group) – Update group properties

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  parameters={[{"name":"subtaskGroupId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Subtask group identifier.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
